channel.title: Creating quest command - help please!
channel.description:
I want to create a quest command so all the quest numbers automatically go to 15 which means they are completely once you type in the command.(done)
Any ideas for a delta base server? WHAT I WANT QUESTS SET TO: [code]character-q1 = 15 character-q2 = 15 character-q3 = 15 character-q4 = 15 character-q5 = 15 character-q6 = 15 character-q7 = 15 character-q8 = 15 character-q9 = 15 character-q10 = 15 character-q11 = 15[/code]

item.title: Creating quest command - help please!

q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15;
q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15;
q11 = 15; q12 = 15; q13 = 15; q14 = 15; q15 = 15;
q16 = 15;
}[/quote]

item.title: Creating quest command - help please!
item.dc:creator: @owwch_u_died owwch u died
item.description:
@owwch_u_died wrote:

}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“quests”) && playerRights >= 3) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
q1 = 15;
q2 = 15;
q3 = 15;
q4 = 15;
q5 = 15;
q6 = 15;
q7 = 15;
q8 = 15;
q9 = 15;
q10 = 15;
q11 = 15;
}

Thats wat i got and works awesome. but i have 15 quests not 11. So Idk

item.title: Creating quest command - help please!

item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Not sure what you mean by spawn a firecape…
Like when you do the quest command, you get a firecape?

if(wearID == 6570 && killedJad == 0){
sM(“You must have defeated TzTok-Jad to wear this cape.”);
return false;
}

You may need to configure the killedJad variable, it depends on your source.[/quote]
